name: Arc of Time
description:
Arc of Time is a puzzle platformer game built in seven days for Brackeys Jam 2020. You use the your bow to solve puzzles and defeat enemies by rewinding them. 

Controls:
A & D: Movement
Space: Jump
Space + Space: Double jump
Left Mouse Button: Fire arrow

Contributors:
